Chris Kurdziel

Building Shelby. Previously @ McKesson. Vanderbilt & Cornell grad. New Yorker. Husband. Explorer. Are you coming to Mars or what?

About Chris

My name is Chris. I went to school at Vandy and Cornell. I used to do some investing and worked in healthcare for a few years.

I was born in New York but I’ve lived in 6 states. I’m also a gourmand, gamer, golfer, and geek. I love memes, mountains, metal, music, and mayhem. And alliteration.

Now, I work at Shelby.tv. I also spend a lot of time thinking about problems in the healthcare industry.
